about_the_game:
Escape first: Alchemist 2 is a multiplayer first-person escape room adventure game, where you play as the Apprentices of a reclusive sorcerer-alchemist...

Break into ancient vaults to discover alchemical ingredients, delve through the castle’s interior to uncover hidden paths and secrets, and in so doing unlock your own potential as an alchemist...

  • Obtain esoteric knowledge and stir up arcane potions to further explore the realm around you!

  • Consume potions to gain powers or alter your form to traverse the labyrinthine castle and uncover hidden truths!

  • Discover new potion recipes by diving into the memories of frozen citizens!

  • Explore their minds to learn alchemical knowledge and secrets, peering into the mystery that froze an entire realm!

A chilling truth awaits, ready to be thawed out by the alchemist or alchemists that can master their skills, from potion brewing to puzzle solving!
